name: Elemental Wild Shape
description: You can expend two uses of Wild Shape at the same time to transform into an air, earth, fire, or water elemental.

name: Wild Companion
description: As a Magic action you can expend a spell slot or a use of Wild Shape to cast the Find Familiar spell without Material components.

name: Wild Resurgence
description: Once on each of your turns, if you have no uses of Wild Shape left, you can give yourself one use by expending a spell slot (no action required). In addition, you can expend one use of Wild Shape (no action required) to give yourself a level 1 spell slot, but you can't do so again until you finish a Long Rest.

name: Archdruid: Nature Magician
description: You can convert uses of Wild Shape into a spell slot. Choose a number of unexpended uses of Wild Shape and convert them into a single spell slot, with each use contributing 2 spell levels. You cannot use this feature again until you finish a Long Rest.

name: Land's Aid
description: As a Magic action you can expend a use of your Wild Shape and choose a point within 60 feet of yourself. Vitality-giving flowers and life-draing thorns appear for a moment in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point. Each creature of your choice in the Sphere must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC, taking 2d6 Necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a sucessful one. One creature of your choice in that area regains 2d6 Hit Points. The damage and healing increase to 3d6 at 10th level, and 4d6 at 14th level.

name: Nature's Sanctuary
description: As a Magic action you can expend a use of your Wild Shape and cause spectral trees and vines to appear in a 15-foot Cube on the grouns within 120 feet of yourself. They last for 1 minute, or until you have the Incapacitated condition or die. You and your allies have Half Cover while in that area, and your allies gain the current Resistance of your Nature's Ward while there.

name: Move Nature's Sanctuary
description: As a Bonus Action, you can move your Nature's Sanctuary up to 60 feet to a ground surface within 120 feet of yourself.

name: Moonlight Step
description: As a Bonus Action, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see, and you have Advantage on the next attack roll you make before the end of this turn. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest. You can also regain uses by expending a level 2+

name: Moonlight Step: Regain Uses
description: You can regain uses of Moonlight Step by expending a level 2+ spell slot for each use you want to restore.

name: Wrath of the Sea
description: As a Bonus Action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape to manifest a 5-foot Emanation of ocean spray that surrounds you for 10 minutes. It ends early if you dismiss it (no action required), manifest it again, or have the Incapacitated condition. When you manifest the Emanation, and as a Bonus Action on your subsequent turns you can shoose another creature you can see in the Emanation. The target must succeed on a Constitution save against your spell save DC or take Cold damage, and if the creature is Large or smaller it is pushed up to 15 feet away from you. The damage is a number of d6s equal to your Wisdom modifier.
additionalEffects: Pushes a Large or smaller creature up to 15 feet away from you

name: Starry Form: Archer
description: As a Bonus Action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape to become a constellation of an Archer. When you activate this form, and as a Bonus Action on your subsequent turns, you can make a ranged spell attack. This attack targets one creature within 60 feet of you, and deals Radiant damage equal to 1d8 plus your Wisdom modifier.

name: Starry Form: Chalice
description: As a Bonus Action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape to become a constellation of a chalice. Whenever you cast a spell using a spell slot that restores Hit Points to a creature, you or another creature within 30 feet of you can regain Hit Points equal to 1d8 plus your Wisdom modifier.

name: Starry Form: Dragon
description: As a Bonus Action, you can expend a use of your Wild Shape to become a constellation of a dragon. When you make an Intelligence or a Wisdom check, or a Constitution saving throw to maintain Contentration, you can treat a roll of 9 or lower on the d20 as a 10.

name: Cosmic Omen: Weal (Even)
description: Whenever a creature you can see within 30 feet of you is about to make a d20 Test, you can use your Reaction to roll 1d6 and add the number rolled to the total.

name: Cosmic Omen: Woe (Odd)
description: Whenever a creature you can see within 30 feet of you is about to make a d20 Test, you can use your Reaction to roll 1d6 and subtract the number rolled from the total.
